item.description:
Please join us at the Woburn Mall. On Wednesday 11/7/12 @ 6pm

To Get Teddy Ready!

Will bring some Teddy Bears I pickup from the Salvation Army to dress for Christmas to be first on parade at a Sunrise assisted living in Arlington (you are welcome to attend event in beginining of December), then given to local needy children at Christmas also I will bring  misc. items like felt, sewing needles & supplies. Welcome to bring your own, supplies, Idea's , new or like new teddy bears.

Here is a picture of some bears (and a cow) we dressed last year!

Please let me know if you have any questions.

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Come help dress a Teddy Bear that a Needy Child will get at Xmas
